short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic web browser extension that brings the SIMBAD search functionality to wherever you are in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser add-on to quickly search in the SIMBAD Astronomical Database through a pop-up as well as a context menu.
